entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:06 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 01:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNE 22 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:36 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
